name: Maritime for a Latte
description:
Story

As the captain of a ferry in rough waters, you make the natural decision to abandon the helm and serve coffee to your passengers. It just so happens that your passengers are all latte art connoisseurs. If you impress them with their desired patterns, they will tip generously. Just don't tell them that no one is at the ship's wheel...

Gameplay

Your goal is to maximise profit.

1. Pour milk with *Click*
2. Draw the art shown on the coffee
3. Serve the latte with *Space*

The more accurate your art, the more the passengers will tip!
